root.name: Sega Genesis Collection
root.description: Sega Genesis Collection (also known as Sega Mega Drive Collection in Europe) Is a compilation of 28 popular Sega Genesis games and 5 Sega arcade games. Each game includes some trivia about the game, tips, cheats, and a few titles have video interviews with developers of the game. Games Included Alex Kidd in the Enchanted Castle Altered Beast Bonanza Bros. Columns Comix Zone Decap Attack Ecco the Dolphin Ecco: The Tides of Time Ecco Jr. Flicky Gain Ground Golden Axe Golden Axe II Golden Axe III Kid Chameleon Phantasy Star II Phantasy Star III: Generations of Doom Phantasy Star IV: The End of the Millennium Ristar Shadow Dancer: The Secret of Shinobi Shinobi III: Return of the Ninja Master Sonic the Hedgehog Sonic the Hedgehog 2 Super Thunder Blade Sword of Vermilion Vectorman Vectorman 2 Virtua Fighter 2The PS2's unlockable arcade titles are Altered Beast, Future Spy, Tac/Scan, Zaxxon, and Zektor.The PSP's unlockable arcade titles are Astro Blaster, Congo Bongo, Eliminator, Space Fury, and Super Zaxxon.
